settings.title: Become an MFI Member today
settings.content: Create your free MFI Member account online and join 50,000 other healthcare professionals saving on their medical purchases

settings.title: Create your account and start earning
settings.content: Having the lowest prices just wasn't enough, so we created the MFI Member program to reward our loyal customers for shopping at MFI.

settings.title: All the ways to earn rewards
250 Points for signing up
settings.content: Receive 250 points when you sign up for your account (it's free!)

settings.title: Gold Level Members earn 1 point
settings.content: Earn 1 point for every dollar spent when you're a Gold level member. All new members start off at the Gold level.

settings.title: Platinum Level Members earn 2 points
settings.content: Earn 2 points for every dollar spent when you're a Platinum level member. Reach Platinum status after spending $800 at MFI

settings.title: Diamond Level Members earn 3 points
settings.content: Earn 3 points for every dollar spent when you're a Diamond level member. Reach Diamond status after spending $2,500 at MFI

settings.title: Receive a 5% coupon
settings.content: Reach Platinum level by spending $800 at MFI, and we'll send you a 5% coupon to use on your next purchase

settings.title: Receive a 10% off coupon
settings.content: Reach Diamond level by spending $2,500 at MFI, and we'll send you a 10% coupon to use on your next purchase

settings.title: 250 Points for product reviews
settings.content: For every product review, you'll receive 250 points (maximum of 5 product reviews)

settings.title: 500 Points for reviewing MFI Medical
settings.content: Leave a review of your experience working with MFI, and get 500 points

settings.title: 250 Bonus points after your second order
settings.content: Get an extra 250 points when you place your second online order with MFI

settings.title: The more you spend, the more you earn
settings.content: Earn points for every online purchase. Gold status members receive 1 point, Platinum status members receive 2 points, and Diamond status members receive 3 points for every dollar spent online.

settings.title: Give $15, get $15 for every referral
settings.content: Refer your friends and colleagues to MFI Medical, and we'll send you both a $15 coupon after they place their first order

settings.title: How do I redeem points?
settings.answer:
Sign in to your MFI Member account online. Shop for the items you need. Then, at checkout, select how many points you would like to redeem using the slider bar.

Click on the "redeem" button to apply those points as a cash discount to your cart. Every 100 points are equivalent to cash savings of $1.

settings.title: What is the point to dollar redemption rate?
settings.answer: 100 points is equivalent to $1 of cash savings. You need to use a minimum of 500 points ($5 value).

settings.title: Is there a minimum amount I need to redeem points?
settings.answer: To redeem points, you must use a minimum of 500 points ($5 value).

settings.title: Where can I see my point balance
settings.answer: Sign into your online account, and your point balance will be displayed on your account page

settings.title: Can I get my product personalized?
settings.answer: It depends on the creator and the product. All options are outlined on the product page, so look out for customization options there.

settings.title: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.

settings.contact_info_text: If we still haven't answered your question, you can contact us below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
